title: Does it make sense
text: The range of $$x$$ values was $$1981$$ to 2002; the year $$1970$$ is not in this range.

title: Explanation
text: The regression equation does not apply, because predicting for the year $$1970$$ is extrapolation, which requires a different process. Also, a negative number does not make sense in this context, where we are predicting flu cases diagnosed.
